bibl.title: Property Ownership and Tax Payment in Fourth Century Monasticism.
Monastic Estates in Late Antique and Early Islamic Egypt. Ostraca, Papyri, and Essays in Memory of Sarah Clackson (P. Clackson)

bibl.seg: CHOAT Malcolm, Property Ownership and Tax Payment in Fourth Century Monasticism.
